certificateBody.description: The contents of the signing certificate in PEM-encoded format.

certificateId.description: The ID for the signing certificate.

status.description: The status you want to assign to the certificate. `Active` means that the certificate can be used for programmatic calls to Amazon Web Services `Inactive` means that the certificate cannot be used.

userName.description: The name of the user the signing certificate is for.
